mapper.delete: delete from WeiBoTag where WTid in (${ids})
mapper.select: select * from (select n.*,rownum rn from (select * from WeiboTag) n where #{pageSize} * #{pageNum} >= rownum) where rn > #{pageSize} * (#{pageNum} - 1)
mapper.update: update WeiboTag set WTname = #{wtname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where WTid = #{wtid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
